titleStmt.title: The hectors, or, The false challenge a comedy written in the year MDCLV, the scene, London.
titleStmt.author: Prestwich, Edmund, fl. 1650-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Bedel and T. Collins, and are to be sold at their shop ...,
